title: DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_SPRING_REMOVED
content:
0xC485E07E4F0B79580xB4A9A558// DoorSystemSetSpringRemoved
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_SPRING_REMOVED(Hash doorHash, BOOL removed, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);Parameters:doorHash: Door system identifierremoved: requestDoor: forceUpdate: On true invokes DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_DOOR_STATE; otherwise requestDoor is unused.Includes networking check: ownership vs. or the door itself isn't networked.
codeBlocks:
// DoorSystemSetSpringRemoved
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_SPRING_REMOVED(Hash doorHash, BOOL removed, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);

-- Example usage for DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_SPRING_REMOVED
DoorSystemSetSpringRemoved(GetHashKey('prop'), false, false, false)
